Being a man is, first and foremost, being a good human,...
...and that means being responsible, being reliable, working hard,...
The notion that somehow defining yourself as a man is dependent on:...
Are you able to put someone else down instead of lifting them up?
Are you able to dominate as opposed to support?
...and a view that, thankfully, I see a lot of young people rejecting.
If you are very confident about your sexuality,...
...you don't have to have eight women around you twerking.
